mx.org.pescadormvp.core.client.components

Interface ComponentRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComponentRegistryImpl

    public interface ComponentRegistry
    Internal Pescador MVP use. Registry of components. Pescador MVP applications shouldn't need to access this directly.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addComponents(Component<?>... components)
      Add components to the registry.
      void callFinalizeSetup()
      Call finalizeSetup() on all components so they can do stuff that can only be done once all components have been registered.
      <I extends Component<I>> 
      I      		 getComponent(Class<I> publicInterface)
      Get the component that has this public interface.
      PAVComponent<?,?> getPAVComponent(String token)
      Get the place-activity-view (PAV) component associated with this main token, as defined in the Place associated with the component.
      void setRegions(Set<Class<? extends ForRegionTag>> regions)
      Establish the regions available in the UI.

    • Method Detail

      • addComponents

        void addComponents(Component<?>... components)
        Add components to the registry.
        Parameters:
        components - The components to be added.

      • callFinalizeSetup

        void callFinalizeSetup()
        Call finalizeSetup() on all components so they can do stuff that can only be done once all components have been registered.

      • getComponent

        <I extends Component<I>> I getComponent(Class<I> publicInterface)
        Get the component that has this public interface.
        Parameters:
        publicInterface - The public interface of the component being requested.
        Returns:
        The component requested, or null if none was found for this interface.

      • getPAVComponent

        PAVComponent<?,?> getPAVComponent(String token)
        Get the place-activity-view (PAV) component associated with this main token, as defined in the Place associated with the component. (The main token is the first part of history tokens/URL fragment identifiers.)
        Parameters:
        token - The main token for the PAV component being requested.
        Returns:
        The PAV component requested, or null if none was found for this main token.

      • setRegions

        void setRegions(Set<Class<? extends ForRegionTag>> regions)
        Establish the regions available in the UI.
        Parameters:
        regions - A set containing the tag interfaces that refer to regions available in the UI.
